name: 8 Funky Days at Shark Beach
description:
Submission Info

Submission for Hexcode Showdown Jam 2020. The main constraint of this Jam was to create a game using only a certain color palette voted upon and released at the start of the Jam, Funky Future 8.

Time Taken: 7 days out of 11 days.

Download for Best Experience.

Story

You heard about the fine selection of fresh humans at Shark Beach. Wishing to sate your vast appetite, you head to the location to try out their dinner selections for a few days. Supposedly they have a world renowned shark defense system, but reports say security hasn't been paying attention. Hopefully this will be an easy meal!

Controls

  • Hold Left Click on a point in the water to swim towards that location. 
  • Right Click to Pause.
  • You will steady in the proper direction after a few seconds.
  • Eat enough swimmers to sate your appetite for the day.
  • Avoid anything that is not a swimmer.
  • Do not fall off the left side of the screen.

Team

Christopher Hahn

Assets

  • All assets were made by me.
  • Sprites were made with Piskel - https://www.piskelapp.com/
  • Sound clips were recorded in Audactiy - https://www.audacityteam.org/
  • Font was made with FontStruct - https://fontstruct.com/
  • Game was made with Unity 2019.4.8f1 - https://unity.com/
